question: Luhri Stage-I Hydro Power Project, which was seen in news recently, is located in which state?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet has recently approved the proposal to invest Rs 1,810 crore for 210 MW Luhri Stage-I hydropower project.
It is located on river Satluj in Shimla and Kullu districts of Himachal Pradesh. The project is expected to generate 758.20 million units of electricity annually. The project is being implemented by Satluj Jal Vidyut Nigam Ltd (SJVNL).
